column5: Got real close to some carp today so took some pics.  \                           Okay i cheated took these pictures at pond at Marineland where the carp beg for food like dogs.        cheers,  ehg
Wow Erik, That third carp looks really white and huge!   Hope you  had as much fun as your daughter out there!  FHR
LOL...great pics...good thing Victor wasn't there, or he'd try to kiss the thing.....haha.
geez cliff, you don't have to tell everyone!

Didn't we have a deal that if you French kissed a carp, Wolfville and I would give you a pack of Nash leads?  With those lips, I'm sure those carp would be more than adequate...Road trip next week to see them?  Cool pics Ehg
LOL...take the camera on the roadtrip guys!!!!
Now I'm getting kind of nervous traveling with those guys.
Don't you need a tongue to French kiss?  LOL
Victor does if he wants some new carp leads
first one looks like a Manatee!  Anyone up for OFC outing to Marineland!
My daughter had a great time Ric,  Luckily it was cool and cloudy so i had a great time as well. I was thinking quite the opposite! Yuck!  cheers,  ehg
